text: technology shifts that once took decades
now unfold in months the cloud is
revolutionizing the way we work the way
we learn the way we entertain this
revolution is transforming the video
industry with migration to the cloud
increasing exponentially from video
servers to media services from finite
infrastructure to infinite capacity from
channel line ups to streaming anytime
everywhere
AWS media services combine the vast
capabilities of the Amazon Web Services
cloud with the deep video expertise of
AWS elemental wherever you are on your
journey to the cloud we help you deliver
your premium content to every device
with cloud-based pay-as-you-go services
that form the core of agile scalable
future ready video workflows whether
you're launching a TV channel delivering
on-demand programming or broadcasting
live events on a global scale with
flexible infrastructure and simplified
video operations you can focus on what
really matters captivating your viewers
extending your reach and monetizing your
content AWS perfecting the media
experience
